Name: Slice of Sea
About the game: Slice of Sea is a peaceful adventure and puzzle game. You play as Seaweed, a sea creature clearly out of their element. Explore desolate world of dust, all hand-drawn on paper in unique art style. Collect items, solve puzzles and lead Seaweed back home to the sea. Use keyboard to move around and mouse to solve puzzles. Music was created by Thumpmonks and main theme song written and performed by Cat Jahnke.
